hero.title: The Ultimate Solution for Street Food Lovers
hero.para: NearTreat helps you locate street food vendors, providing live location tracking and availability of recipes. Discover the best street food near you effortlessly.

features.title: Features That Delight
features.description: Enhance your street food experience with advanced features

items.title: Community of Food Lovers
items.description: Join a community of fellow food enthusiasts who share your passion for street cuisine. Connect, share recommendations, and embark on gastronomic journeys together.

items.title: Find Nearby Favorites
items.description: Discover the best street food vendors in your vicinity. Our app uses GPS technology to help you find nearby favorites quickly.

items.title: Detailed Menu Information
items.description: Get detailed information about the menus offered by street vendors, including ingredients, prices, and customer reviews.

items.title: Search and Filter
items.description: Easily search for specific dishes or cuisines, and apply filters to find exactly what you're craving.

items.title: Real-Time Convenience and Menu Magic
items.description: Our advanced technology lets you track live locations and real-time menu updates, ensuring that you're always in the know about what's available.

items.title: User-Friendly Interface
items.description: Our user-friendly interface is designed to provide a seamless experience across all devices. Whether you're using your smartphone, tablet, or computer, NearTreat is your reliable companion on your street food journey.

callToAction.heading: Ready to embark on a delicious journey?
callToAction.subheading: Download NearTreat today and start exploring the best street food around you!

footer.companyDescription1: Discover the best street food near you with NearTreat. Your ultimate guide to local street cuisine.
footer.companyDescription2: Join a community of food lovers and find your favorite street food vendors easily.
footer.socialDescription: Follow us on social media to stay updated with the latest street food trends.
